name: Dell Support File
summary: Learn about .SDR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The presence of the dell.sdr file means that the computer is using a Dell-installed version of Windows.

description: File named dell.sdr and located on Dell computers in the C:\â€‹ directory; contains system information and is used by Dell technical support purposes; should not be manually edited or deleted or any requests for Dell support may not work properly.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .sdr file in SmartDraw 2020
images.caption: SDR file open in SmartDraw 2020
